participant_1.name: Mason
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and dedicated, Mason enjoys the simple pleasures of life and finds joy in nature.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Lila is a vibrant and introspective young woman who is navigating the complexities of her emotions after a recent breakup.
participant_2.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

content.text: On The Ball, City, the oldest football song in the world.
